TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CodeTypeDeclaration extends System.CodeDom.CodeTypeMember

summary.span: 表示类、结构、接口或枚举的类型声明。

span.span: Represents a type declaration for a class, structure, interface, or enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可用于表示声明类、结构、接口或枚举的代码。 can be used to represent code that declares a class, structure, interface, or enumeration. 可用于声明嵌套在另一类型中的类型。 can be used to declare a type that is nested within another type. 属性指定正在声明的类型的基类型或基类型。The property specifies the base type or base types of the type being declared. 属性包含类型成员, 这些成员可以包含方法、字段、属性、注释和其他类型。The property contains the type members, which can include methods, fields, properties, comments and other types. 属性指示类型声明的值,它指示类型的类型类别。 The property indicates the values for the type declaration, which indicate the type category of the type. 、、和方法分别指示该类型是类、结构、枚举还是接口类型。 The , , , and methods indicate whether the type is a class, structure, enumeration, or interface type, respectively. > [!NOTE] > 某些编程语言仅支持引用类型或类的声明。Some programming languages only support the declaration of reference types, or classes. 若要检查特定于语言的 CodeDOM 代码生成器是否支持声明接口、枚举或值类型, 请调用方法来测试适当的标志。To check a language-specific CodeDOM code generator for support for declaring interfaces, enumerations, or value types, call the method to test for the appropriate flags. 指示支持接口, 表示支持枚举, 并指示对值类型 (如结构) 的支持。 indicates support for interfaces, indicates support for enumerations, and indicates support for value types such as structures. 您可以在一个完整的声明中生成一个类或结构实现, 也可以跨多个声明来实现该实现。You can build a class or a structure implementation in one complete declaration, or spread the implementation across multiple declarations. 属性指示类型声明是完整的还是部分的。The property indicates whether the type declaration is complete or partial. 并非所有代码生成器都支持分部类型声明, 因此, 您应通过使用标志 调用方法来测试此支持。Not all code generators support partial type declarations, so you should test for this support by calling the method with the flag . ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用声明类型。This example demonstrates using a to declare a type. [!code-cpp[CodeTypeDeclarationExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeTypeDeclarationExample/CPP/codetypedeclarationexample.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[CodeTypeDeclarationExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeTypeDeclarationExample/CS/codetypedeclarationexample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CodeTypeDeclarationExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeTypeDeclarationExample/VB/codetypedeclarationexample.vb#2)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 用指定的名称初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property BaseTypes As CodeTypeReferenceCollection

span.span: Gets the base types of the type.

value.span: 一个 对象，它指示类型的基类型。

span.span: A object that indicates the base types of the type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在 Visual Basic 中生成一个不是从基类型继承的类, 但它实现了一个或多个接口, 则必须将作为集合中的第一项包括在内。To generate a class in Visual Basic that does not inherit from a base type, but that does implement one or more interfaces, you must include as the first item in the collection. > [!NOTE] > 在 .NET Framework 版本2.0 中, 如果要实现的接口已存在并且你按类型引用它, 则不需要。In the .NET Framework version 2.0 you do not need the for if the interface you are implementing already exists and you are referring to it by type. 例如, 如果要实现接口并将其添加到包含此`ctd.BaseTypes.Add(New CodeTypeReference(typeof(ICollection)))`语句的集合, 则不需要前面`ctd.BaseTypes.Add(New CodeTypeReference(GetType(Object)))`的语句。For example, if you are implementing the interface and add it to the collection with this statement, `ctd.BaseTypes.Add(New CodeTypeReference(typeof(ICollection)))`, you do not need the preceding `ctd.BaseTypes.Add(New CodeTypeReference(GetType(Object)))` statement. 下面的代码演示如何将添加到引用的集合。The following code illustrates the addition of a to the collection that refers to . ```vb Dim ctd As New CodeTypeDeclaration("Class1") ctd.IsClass = True ctd.BaseTypes.Add(New CodeTypeReference(GetType(Object))) ctd.BaseTypes.Add(New CodeTypeReference("Interface1")) ``` ```csharp CodeTypeDeclaration ctd = new CodeTypeDeclaration("Class1"); ctd.IsClass = true; ctd.BaseTypes.Add(new CodeTypeReference(typeof(Object))); ctd.BaseTypes.Add(new CodeTypeReference("Interface1")); ``` 前面的代码生成以下 Visual Basic 代码的等效项。The preceding code generates the equivalent of the following Visual Basic code. ```vb Public Class Class1 Implements Interface1 ``` 但是, 实际生成的 Visual Basic 代码如下所示。However, the Visual Basic code actually generated is the following. ```vb Public Class Class1 Inherits Object Implements Interface1 ```

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示该类型声明是完整的类型声明还是分部类型声明。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the type declaration is complete or partial.

value.span: 如果该类或结构声明是实现的分部表示形式，则为 ；如果该声明是该类或结构的完整实现，则为 。

span.span: if the class or structure declaration is a partial representation of the implementation; if the declaration is a complete implementation of the class or structure.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以在一个完整的声明中生成一个类或结构实现, 也可以跨多个声明来实现实现。You can build a class or structure implementation in one complete declaration, or spread the implementation across multiple declarations. 实现通常在一个完整的类型声明中提供。Implementations are commonly supplied in one complete type declaration. 在这种情况下, 将 type 声明属性`false`设置为, 这指示类型声明表示类或结构实现的所有详细信息。In this case, set the type declaration property to `false`, which indicates that the type declaration represents all details for the class or structure implementation. 利用分部类型声明, 可以更轻松地在应用程序的不同模块中生成类或结构实现的不同部分。A partial type declaration makes it easier to build different portions of a class or structure implementation in different modules of your application. 分部类型声明可以存储在一个源文件中, 也可以分布在多个源文件中, 这些源文件最终编译在一起以形成合并类型实现。The partial type declarations can be stored in one source file, or spread across multiple source files that are eventually compiled together to form the combined type implementation. C#语言通过`partial`关键字支持类和结构的分部类型声明。The C# language supports partial type declarations of classes and structures through the `partial` keyword. Visual Basic 支持带有`Partial`关键字的类和结构的分部类型声明。Visual Basic supports partial type declarations of classes and structures with the `Partial` keyword. 并非所有代码生成器都支持分部类型声明, 因此, 您应通过使用标志 调用方法来测试此支持。Not all code generators support partial type declarations, so you should test for this support by calling the method with the flag . > [!NOTE] > 类和结构支持分部类型声明。Partial type declarations are supported for classes and structures. 如果为枚举或接口指定了分部类型声明, 则生成的代码会生成编译器错误。If you specify a partial type declaration for an enumeration or interface, the generated code produces compiler errors. 当跨多个声明提供类或结构实现时, 请将初始`true`声明和所有补充声明的属性设置为。When supplying a class or structure implementation across multiple declarations, set the property to `true` for the initial declaration and all supplemental declarations. 初始声明必须完全指定类型签名, 包括访问修饰符、继承的类型和实现的接口。The initial declaration must fully specify the type signature, including access modifiers, inherited types, and implemented interfaces. 补充声明不需要重新指定类型签名。The supplementary declarations do not need to re-specify the type signature. 如果在补充声明中重新定义类型签名, 则通常会产生编译器错误。A compiler error typically results if you redefine the type signature in a supplementary declaration. Visual Studio 2005 使用分部类型将用户生成的代码与设计器代码分开。Visual Studio 2005 uses partial types to separate user-generated code from designer code. 在 Visual Basic Windows 应用程序项目中, 用户代码放置在未由`Partial`关键字限定的分部类中; 设计器提供的代码出现在`Partial`包含关键字的分部类中。In Visual Basic Windows Application projects, the user code is placed in a partial class that is not qualified by the `Partial` keyword; the designer-provided code appears in the partial class that has the `Partial` keyword. 在C#中, 用户代码和设计器代码都出现在由`partial`关键字标识的分部类中。In C#, both the user code and designer code appear in partial classes identified by the `partial` keyword. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用在多个声明中提供类实现。This example demonstrates using a to supply a class implementation across multiple declarations. 该示例生成了初始类声明语句, 并将属性设置`true`为。The example builds the initial class declaration statement and sets the property to `true`. [!code-cpp[CodeDomPartialTypeExample#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeDomPartialTypeExample/CPP/source.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[CodeDomPartialTypeExample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeDomPartialTypeExample/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[CodeDomPartialTypeExample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeDomPartialTypeExample/VB/source.vb#3)] 示例中的其他方法扩展了类实现。A different method in the example extends the class implementation. 此方法为现有类生成新的类型声明语句, 并将属性设置为。 `true`This method builds a new type declaration statement for the existing class and sets the property to `true`. 编译器将两个分部类型声明组合在一起, 以实现完整的类实现。The compiler combines the two partial type declarations together for the complete class implementation. [!code-cpp[CodeDomPartialTypeExample#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeDomPartialTypeExample/CPP/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[CodeDomPartialTypeExample#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeDomPartialTypeExample/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[CodeDomPartialTypeExample#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeDomPartialTypeExample/VB/source.vb#7)]

summary.span: 获取或设置类型的特性。

span.span: Gets or sets the attributes of the type.

value.span: 一个 对象，它指示该类型的特性。

span.span: A object that indicates the attributes of the type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含在运行时调查类型时所使用的相同类型的值。 The property contains the same type of values used by when investigating a type at run time. 其中许多标志并不对应于某些语言的类型声明语法。Many of these flags do not correspond to the type declaration syntax for some languages. 因此, 只有以下标志对: 、 、、、 、 、和很重要。 As a result, only the following flags are significant to : , , , , , , , and . > [!NOTE] > 某些标志 (如 ) 的属性中的标志含义重叠, 后者继承自。Some of the flags such as overlap with the meaning of flags in the property of that is inherited from . 属性是继承自 的类的副作用, 因此可以嵌套类。 The property is a side effect of the class inheriting from so that classes can be nested. 应使用属性中的标志, 而不是属性中的标志。The flags in the property should be used instead of the flags in the property. > [!NOTE] > 用于设置可见性标志 (包含单词`Public`或`Nested`的标志) 的模式是使用屏蔽所有可见性标志, 然后设置所需的可见性标志。The pattern for setting the visibility flags (flags containing the words `Public` or `Nested`) is to mask out all visibility flags using the and then set the desired visibility flag. 例如, 将 ( C#名`cd`为) 标识为内部类的代码语句为`cd.TypeAttributes = (cd.TypeAttributes & ~TypeAttributes.VisibilityMask) | TypeAttributes.NotPublic;`。For example, the C# code statement to identify the (named `cd`) as an internal class is `cd.TypeAttributes = (cd.TypeAttributes & ~TypeAttributes.VisibilityMask) | TypeAttributes.NotPublic;`. 在 Visual Basic 中设置相同值的代码为`cd.TypeAttributes = (cd.TypeAttributes And (TypeAttributes.VisibilityMask Xor -1)) Or TypeAttributes.NotPublic`。The code to set the same value in Visual Basic is `cd.TypeAttributes = (cd.TypeAttributes And (TypeAttributes.VisibilityMask Xor -1)) Or TypeAttributes.NotPublic`. 将属性直接设置为可见性标志 (`cd.TypeAttributes = TypeAttributes.NotPublic;`) 会清除可能设置的所有其他标志。 Setting the property directly to a visibility flag (`cd.TypeAttributes = TypeAttributes.NotPublic;`) erases all other flags that might be set.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TypeParameters As CodeTypeParameterCollection

summary.span: 获取类型声明的类型参数。

span.span: Gets the type parameters for the type declaration.

value.span: 包含类型声明的类型参数。

span.span: A that contains the type parameters for the type declaration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 泛型类型声明包含一个或多个未指定的类型 (称为类型参数)。A generic type declaration contains one or more unspecified types known as type parameters. 类型参数名称代表泛型声明主体中的类型。A type parameter name stands for the type within the body of the generic declaration. 例如, 类的泛型声明包含类型参数`T`。For example, the generic declaration for the class contains the type parameter `T`. 有关泛型的详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 类库中的泛型](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/generics/generics-in-the-net-framework-class-library.md)。For more information on generics, see [Generics in the .NET Framework Class Library](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/generics/generics-in-the-net-framework-class-library.md).
